;2

;orthogonal dead end, diagonal
;north
TYPE1=0x02040000,0x00000301,0x5FD73000,0,0

TYPE2=0x02000004,0x00000301,0x5FD73200,1,0
TYPE3=0x02000004,0x03010000,0x5FD73200,0,1
